div.div: As experts in Odoo implementation, we guide you from initial consultation through system setup, ensuring smooth operations and enhanced productivity.
Get expert Odoo customization, we craft personalized modules and UI, adding new functionalities or optimizing existing ones to fit your operations perfectly and boost efficiency.
Smoothly transition to the latest Odoo version with our migration services. We ensure minimal disruption and seamless data transfer so you benefit from new features and performance improvements.

Our Odoo support services ensure that your system runs smoothly day-to-day. Whether you need functional assistance, technical troubleshooting, or quick fixes, our dedicated team provides timely, reliable support, ensuring your business never skips a beat.

div.p: With Odoo has allowed us to distinguish ourselves in our field

div.div: Scale your Odoo system to match your growth. We optimize it to handle increased workloads, ensuring responsiveness and high performance as your business evolves.
Get expert, hands-on Odoo training for your team. We cover specific modules or general usage to ensure they maximize system effectiveness and improve overall productivity.

Our experts integrate Odoo with various third-party applications. We ensure seamless connections to automate processes, boost efficiency, and reduce manual errors.
Zoho, Shopify, Zid, Amazon

As a certified Odoo silver partner, we provide highly experienced, dedicated Odoo developers to meet your unique project needs. Whether you need customizations, new module development, or ongoing technical support.

div.p: Odoo offers a wide range of softeare modules for both small and large businesses.As an Odoo Gold Partner, we are well-versed in the capabilities od Odoo and can assist you in customising it to meet your specific needs.

div.div: We offer over 1300+ custom Odoo apps, available on both our store (Softhealer Store) and the official Odoo marketplace. These apps cover a wide range of functionalities designed to solve specific business challenges.

We offer over 30+ ready-made Odoo solutions, designed to meet the specific needs of major industries. These pre-configured solutions allow you to quickly start your business operations and save valuable time and resources.

Run your Odoo system on our reliable, high-performance cloud platform. We take care of the technical stuff — from uptime to security — so you can focus on your business. Access your Odoo anytime, from anywhere, with peace of mind.

Make Odoo work perfectly for your region. We customize your system to match local laws, languages, and currencies. Especially for businesses in the UAE, we ensure full compliance and a setup that feels just right for your needs.

Softhealer Technologies LLC is a leading Odoo (silver partner) service provider based in the UAE. We specialize in delivering personalised Odoo ERP solutions that organise your business operations, improve efficiency, and drive growth. Whether you’re starting from scratch or looking to improve your current Odoo system, our experienced team is here to help.

a.class: btn rippler rippler-default sh_call_to_action_btn sh_talk_to_us btn-1

div.div: Successfully implemented Odoo solutions across a diverse range of industries in the UAE, delivering tangible results and measurable growth.
From consultation and implementation to customization, migration, and ongoing support, we provide a complete Odoo service package.
Whether you’re a startup or an enterprise, our Odoo solutions scale with your business, ensuring long-term success.
We specialize in crafting personalised Odoo solutions for sectors like retail, healthcare, construction, logistics, and more.
Every solution is meet the unique challenges of your business, ensuring that your Odoo system is perfectly aligned with your operations.
We stay up-to-date with the latest Odoo releases and technologies to offer the most advanced, secure, and efficient solutions.

Odoo is the all-in-one business management software that empowers companies to smooth operations, drive growth, and stay ahead of the competition. Here’s why businesses across the globe choose Odoo for their ERP and CRM needs:

Great application to make the order process for our B2B partners much more convenient and much faster. The after sales service of Softhealer Technologies is likewise of the highest level. Good job!
I have worked with Softhealer Technologies on multiple projects. The attention to detail, diligence, quality of work, and response time is excellent. I would highly recommend this talented team.
Greate company and greate support team, i had a problem in my local Odoo server and they solved it in 5 minutes. i do recommend them for such implementations

The team at Softhealer customised an Odoo app for me which works perfectly, it took a lot of back of forth due to a lot of requriements my side but they got it right every time. I am planning on getting their help as an Odoo going developer for Odoo. Very confident in their ability and service.

I highly recommend Sofhealer. Having worked with them for the past couple of years, I can attest to their consistently excellent service. Their extensive knowledge and commitment to keeping clients well-informed throughout the entire process truly set them apart.
